comments: She is a very nice teacher. She likes respect given and gives it back. She does attendance daily, and is very thorough when you ask her questions. The final is a take home test. Easy A if you show up and respect her!

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Caring (2)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Good ol Millie! TAKE HER!! Super easy, gives you the answers to class work and tests. Crazy sense of humor, extremely helpful, helps u register for classes, finds u the best teachers, and helps with scholarships as well.

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Caring (2)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: She is awesome! She will help you register for classes, and will let you know who are the best and easier teachers. I learned ALOT of things I didnt know bout LBCC. Shes a great professor! TAKE HER!
